name: Cine Tracer
description: Cine Tracer is a realistic cinematography simulator. The player operates real world based cameras, sets up lights, and directs talent/actors in stunning next gen environments created in Unreal Engine 4.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 980ti Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1080ti Storage: 30 GB available space
